actions.committee: Senate Select Committee on Small Business
actions.text: Referred to Senate Select Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Investment Act of 1958.
subjects: Federal aid to minority business enterprises

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 to authorize the Small Business Administration (SBA) to sell specified subsidized minority-enterprise debentures to the Federal Financing Bank, and to pay to such Bank the differential between the small business interest rate and the minority reduced interest rate for such enterprises.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Investment Act of 1958.
